doc.title: Reverting files
doc.section:
It is possible to revert changes done to a file. A reverted file is put back to the exact state it was in before you started working on it. This is done with the Revert command.
How to revert files:
1.Select and right click on the file(s) you want to revert in Solution Explorer. A menu will pop up.
2.Select Revert from the menu.
Notice how the status icons in front of the files change from back to .
Ankhs output window will show all the files that have been reverted.
NOTE: It is not possible to revert a revert command. When you revert an item, all changes you have done to this file will be deleted permanently.
